title: Gay Fuuzoku no Mochigi-san: Sexuality wa Jinsei da.
original_name: ゲイ風俗のもちぎさん　セクシュアリティは人生だ。
sinopse:
Comic essay on the gay industry and LGBT issues by Mochigi, who first worked in the industry as a gay prostitute in Shinjuku Ni-chome, Tokyo, and has since worked in gay bars and gay videos.

(Source: MU)
